arts.ttl: Osasuna chief sends message to Athletic Club over Jesús Areso signing
arts.sum: Osasuna sporting director Braulio Vázquez has on Sunday spoken out on the alleged interest of Athletic Club in the signature of Jesús Areso. The name of defender Areso has long…

arts.ttl: Barcelona boss Hansi Flick addresses Osasuna appeal as La Liga leaders face devastating points deduction
arts.sum: Barcelona head coach Hansi Flick reacts the situation regarding Inigo Martinez and his potential ineligibility for Thursday's La Liga clash against Osasuna.

Athletic Club are close to cementing their place in the top four as they currently sit eight points above Villarreal in fifth-place. Ernesto Valverde's side have been impressive at home, losing just o...

arts.ttl: Rangers warned Athletic Bilbao fuelled by Europa League destiny as legend claims fairytale worthy of a Hollywood movie
arts.sum: Barry Ferguson's men take on the Spaniards for a place in the last four of the competition

arts.ttl: Osasuna launch appeal over Inigo Martinez 'ineligibility' and Barcelona have questions to answer amid fears of points deduction
arts.sum: Osasuna launch an official appeal to the Spanish Football Federation, claiming that Inigo Martinez was not eligible to take to the field for Barcelona on Thursday.

arts.ttl: Barry Ferguson can make Rangers choice 'impossible' with one result as former teammate puts it all on Bilbao
arts.sum: The Gers are just two games away from the semi finals of the Europa League

arts.ttl: Barcelona: Osasuna launch appeal claiming Inigo Martinez was ineligible for LaLiga clash
arts.sum: Osasuna adamant defender should not have played in rescheduled fixture after withdrawing from Spain duty through injury
